attributes.action: Create a new offence of Institutional Political Correctness
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Political correctness is disgusting.

Institutional political correctness is the collective effort of an organisation to deny free speech and to 
marginalize certain words, phrases, actions or attitudes through the instrumentation of public disesteem

Examples: Christmas rebranded winterval in case it offends.

Banning religious symbols like a crucifix in case it offends.

People warned not to have England flags during the World Cup, in case it offends.

No birthday cards making fun of your age, in case it offends

Pointless litigation - prisoners being given public money because they were not allowed to vote

Minorities demanding (and getting) their own way because they claim to be "offended" even though no actual hurt was intended or caused.

Time to end the compensation culture and never hear again the phrase "It's political correctness GONE MAD"
